title: Anyone know this Badge logo?
content:
This is Badge logo having very poor quality. Anyone know this logo releted with which associations? or where i can get clear image for this logo? atleast similar

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123103150im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Badge_6380.jpg)

 [‹ typewriter touch fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123103150/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45069 "Go to previous forum topic") [typeface for a catering company ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123103150/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45041 "Go to next forum topic")
author: artslons

comments.content: istockphoto.com has a few stock illustration packs with badge components that can build this one up, although you’ll probably have to do the eagle yourself.
